thread.title: Speed Up Data Transfer Case Study: Australian Department of Defence
thread.title_full: Speed Up Data Transfer Case Study: Australian Department of Defence

title: Speed Up Data Transfer Case Study: Australian Department of Defence
text:
Speed Up Data Transfer Case Study: Australian Department of Defence 18 September 2015 by iOra Print Email Company Details 
The Australian Department of Defence (DoD) has undertaken field trials to deploy Microsoft SharePoint 2010 into their tactical theatre. The main focus of the project is the modernisation and strategic planning of communication and collaboration systems for Defence to increase the effectiveness of sharing information, collaborating and communicating. Traditionally having relied on Lotus Notes or bespoke solutions, the Australian DoD wanted to modernize its systems, and these tests specifically focused on deploying Microsoft SharePoint within low and unstable bandwidth environments. The initial results are extremely positive. 
For more information on this case study, please download this free white paper. Available Downloads
